title: Jenny Plague-Bringer
description: Jenny has survived in seclusion for the past year, but her peace is about to be shattered by two new paranormals, each of them with unknown intentions, both of them searching for Jenny and Seth.The nightmares of Jenny’s most recent past life in the 1930’s erupt into the present, and she will face enemies old and new. Jenny is more vulnerable than ever, because she can’t use her pox without risking the small life now growing inside her.Jenny’s entire life has led up to the challenge she must now face, one that will endanger her life, her unborn child, and her own soul.
author: J.L. Bryan
